title: Implement CLI commands
description: Implement the augx CLI commands: init, list, show, link, search, update

title: Add Python coding standards module
description: Create modules/coding-standards/python/ with naming conventions, type hints, error handling

title: Add React patterns module
description: Create modules/coding-standards/react/ with component patterns, hooks, state management

title: Create coordination.json schema
description: Create .augment/coordination.json with initial schema and validation. Deliverables: .augment/coordination.json file, JSON schema definition, initial content with existing rules mapped.

title: Implement file association tracking
description: Track which files are created/modified by which tasks. Deliverables: File tracking in coordination manifest, auto-update on file changes. Must track createdBy, modifiedBy, and spec associations.

title: Implement auto-sync on file changes
description: Automatically update coordination manifest when files change. Deliverables: File watcher or git hook, auto-sync mechanism. Must batch updates to avoid performance issues.

title: Create coordination system tests
description: Create tests for coordination system. Deliverables: Test suite for coordination manifest, validation tests. Must validate schema, sync utilities, and query functions.

title: Migrate existing data
description: Migrate existing Beads tasks and OpenSpec specs to coordination system. Deliverables: Migration script, updated coordination manifest with existing data. Must ensure no data loss.

title: Create coordination system rule
description: Create .augment/rules/coordination-system.md documenting the coordination system. Deliverables: .augment/rules/coordination-system.md, documentation for AI agents, usage examples.

title: Update AGENTS.md with coordination info
description: Update AGENTS.md to document coordination system. Deliverables: Updated AGENTS.md with coordination system section, query examples for AI agents.

title: Extend Beads task format
description: Add spec and rules fields to Beads task format. Deliverables: Updated Beads workflow module documentation, example tasks with new fields. Must be backward compatible.

title: Create Beads ↔ Coordination sync utility
description: Create utility to sync Beads tasks with coordination manifest. Deliverables: Sync utility script/function, documentation. Must handle task status changes and creation/deletion.

title: Add frontmatter to OpenSpec specs
description: Add YAML frontmatter support to OpenSpec specs. Deliverables: Updated OpenSpec workflow module documentation, example specs with frontmatter. Must be backward compatible.

title: Create OpenSpec ↔ Coordination sync utility
description: Create utility to sync OpenSpec specs with coordination manifest. Deliverables: Sync utility script/function, documentation. Must handle spec status changes and creation/archival.

title: Implement query functions
description: Implement AI agent discovery functions: getActiveSpecs(), getTasksForSpec(specId), getRulesForTask(taskId), getSpecForFile(filePath), getTasksForFile(filePath). Must have error handling and performance < 100ms per query.

title: Create CLI commands
description: Add CLI commands for querying coordination data: augx coord specs, augx coord tasks <spec-id>, augx coord rules <task-id>, augx coord file <path>. Must have help text and JSON output option.

title: Add API design domain rules module
description: Create modules/domain-rules/api-design/ with REST, GraphQL, versioning guidelines

title: Add security domain rules module
description: Create modules/domain-rules/security/ with OWASP, authentication, encryption guidelines

title: Publish to npm
description: Publish augx CLI to npm registry

title: Create contribution guidelines
description: Create CONTRIBUTING.md with guidelines for adding new modules

title: Add design patterns examples module
description: Create modules/examples/design-patterns/ with common patterns and implementations

title: Augment Extensions Repository Initialized
description: Repository initialized with OpenSpec and Beads integration

title: Beads Prefix Standardization
description: Parent task: Formalize and validate 'bd-' prefix standard for all Beads issue IDs. See openspec/changes/beads-prefix-standardization/ for full spec.

title: Create naming convention spec
description: Create openspec/specs/beads/naming-convention.md with formal specification. Deliverables: Spec file created, Format rules documented, Examples provided, Validation rules defined.

title: Update project context
description: Update openspec/project-context.md to reference naming convention. Deliverables: Project context updated, Reference to naming convention added.

title: Update coordination system rules
description: Add task ID validation to .augment/rules/coordination-system.md. Deliverables: Validation rule added, Examples provided, Pattern documented.

title: Update Beads workflow documentation
description: Add naming convention section to augment-extensions/workflows/beads/rules/workflow.md. Deliverables: Naming convention section added, Rationale explained, Examples provided.

title: Update AGENTS.md
description: Ensure AGENTS.md clearly states 'bd-' prefix convention. Deliverables: AGENTS.md updated, Convention clearly stated.

title: Audit all documentation
description: Search all .md files for references to issue IDs and ensure they use 'bd-' prefix. Deliverables: All documentation audited, Any incorrect references fixed.

title: Create validation script
description: Create scripts/validate-beads-prefix.ps1 to validate all issue IDs. Deliverables: Validation script created, Tests all issues in .beads/issues.jsonl, Returns exit code 0 on success, 1 on failure.

title: Add coordination manifest validation
description: Update coordination manifest to validate task ID prefixes. Deliverables: Validation logic added to coordination system, Rejects invalid task IDs, Clear error messages.

title: Update git hooks
description: Add prefix validation to pre-commit hook. Deliverables: Pre-commit hook updated, Validates issue IDs before commit, Clear error messages.

title: Test validation
description: Test all validation mechanisms with valid and invalid IDs. Deliverables: All validation tested, Edge cases covered, Documentation updated.

title: Investigate bd doctor warning
description: Investigate why bd doctor shows prefix mismatch warning. Deliverables: Root cause identified, Solution proposed.

title: Fix or document false positive
description: Either fix the false positive or document it as known issue. Deliverables: False positive fixed OR Known issue documented with workaround.

title: Update coordination manifest
description: Update .augment/coordination.json with this change. Deliverables: Coordination manifest updated, All tasks linked, All specs linked.

title: Run all tests
description: Run all validation scripts and tests. Deliverables: All tests pass, No regressions.

title: Commit and archive
description: Commit all changes and archive the OpenSpec change. Deliverables: All changes committed, OpenSpec change archived, Documentation complete.

title: Rename modules/ to augment-extensions/
description: Parent task: Rename modules/ directory to augment-extensions/ throughout entire codebase. See openspec/changes/rename-modules-folder/ for full spec.

title: Phase 1: Preparation - Audit and backup
description: Audit all references to project's modules/ directory in codebase (EXCLUDING node_modules/). Search for 'modules/' in project files only (*.md, *.json, *.ts, *.js, *.ps1). Create comprehensive list of files to modify (excluding node_modules/). Commit current changes and create git branch feat/rename-modules-to-augment-extensions.

title: Phase 2: Rename physical directory
description: Rename project's modules/ to augment-extensions/ (NOT node_modules/). Verify all subdirectories and files intact. Confirm node_modules/ directory remains unchanged.

title: Phase 3: Update CLI source code
description: Update all CLI command files (init, list, show, link, search, update, coord, sync) and utility files (beads-sync, openspec-sync, coordination-queries, file-tracking, migrate, auto-sync). Change all references from project's modules/ to augment-extensions/ (excluding node_modules/).

title: Phase 4: Update configuration files
description: Update package.json files array to include augment-extensions/ instead of modules/. Do NOT modify node_modules references. Update .gitignore if needed (project modules/ only).

title: Phase 5: Update documentation
description: Update all documentation files: README.md, AGENTS.md, MODULES.md, MODULE_DEVELOPMENT.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, PROJECT_STATUS.md, all docs/ files, all .augment/rules/ files, and module README.md files. Change all references from project's modules/ to augment-extensions/ (excluding node_modules/).

title: Phase 6: Update test files
description: Update tests/coordination-tests.ps1 and tests/functional-tests.ps1. Change all path references from project's modules/ to augment-extensions/ (excluding node_modules/).

title: Phase 7: Build and validation
description: Build CLI with npm run build. Test all CLI commands (list, search, show). Verify package contents with npm pack --dry-run. Verify all documentation links work. Search for any remaining project modules/ references (excluding node_modules/). Confirm node_modules/ directory unchanged.

title: Phase 8: Update coordination system
description: Update .augment/coordination.json if needed. Update any file paths in coordination data. Update Beads task tracking.

title: Phase 9: Final checks and commit
description: Review all changes. Check for any missed references. Verify consistency across all files. Verify all docs updated. Stage all changes and commit with message: feat: rename modules/ to augment-extensions/. Push to branch.
